api_list.name: /rate-of-change/btc-fiat
api_list.description: Predict price fluctuation rate of Bitcoin for 24 hours by AI.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coin-pred-api-v1.p.rapidapi.com/rate-of-change/btc-fiat"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coin-pred-api-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
